PErceptor/elita/Nightlight

Elita woke up and looking at her dad said "Daddy, when will my mom wake 
up??"

Perceptor dryly said th Straight shot "For the safely of this Girl, she have 
to leave the room..."

The machine started to remove the Nightlight's coma status and decrease her 
energy level to the minimal.

-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Friday, May 13, 2011 5:07 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: BATTLE at the Ark!

Straight Shot nodds.

"Yes sir, we'll do what we can... Aw maan, fine time to be without Tucson..

Quickstride looks to her.

"Hey, I'll be okay for a while, why don't you go check up on your brother?"

She nodds.

"Thank you Quickstride, I'll take Elita with me."

She now walks into the stasis area, where Tucson had gone to rest.  He 
looked quite peaceful laying there, yet, he appeared to be stirring 
somewhat.

"Wait a minute, he's stirring, that means he's coming around.  That can't 
be, he's supposed to rest for a longer period of time than that.  What the 
pit's bringing him out of... I bet he didn't turn off his com link, that's 
what.  C'mon Elita, we better go see why your Uncle Tucson is cutting his 
stasis time a little short."

Tucson opens his eyes, and with a quiet sigh, he sits up on the table.
Straight Shot eyes him and clears her throat.

"Ahem!  You do realize you have not rested for the ample amount of time it 
takes to repair your systems right?"

He nodds.

" I know.  And you're right, I left my com link on.  I'm all right though, I 
think I've rested for a reasonable amount of time, just enough to get 
through our next crisis.  With most of our comrades in stasis, Rodimus is 
going to need substantial assistance"

He now gets on his feet.  Straight Shot tries to stop him.

"Wait, maybe it's not such a hot idea.  You need your rest."

Tucson smiles.

"I'll be fine, really.  Is that Elita with you? I can hear her."

Straight Shot chuckles.

"Nothing gets past your audio sensors.  It sure is.  Lemme guess, you wanna 
hold her right?"

He nodds.  And is soon given Elita as he holds her gently in his own arms. 
Straight Shot smiles as he holds her.  He sits back down with Straight Shot.

"You know, I think you and Talon would make excellent parents."

Tucson smiles as he gets up again, and slowly walks out of the room with 
Straight Shot beside him, holding Elita in his arms.

" We'll see about that..  Right now I think she would really like to see her 
father.  Uncle Tucson can't take all the attention away from your dad."

He gently rubs her head, and enters the room where Rodimus is.

" I know what you'll tell me, and you're right, I shouldn't be out of stasis 
just yet, but, I couldn't help thinking about what would happen if I wasn't 
there to lend you support.  Oh, and I thought you might want to say hello to 
Elita."

He smiles as he holds her close to Rodimus, waiting for him to hold her.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> > <OLD>
> >
> > PErceptor scanned Nighlight and said "Her body is all right, she can
> fuction by herself as soon as we bring her back her coma... it's the mind
> that worry me"and add dryly"this will be your part of the job, Rodimus: 
> when
> I remove the stasis, she will awake and you will be there... I want to 
> check
> her reaction to... Someone that she is attached of; if all works all 
> right,
> she will remember you and we can evaluate her mind... In the worse case
> scenario, we have to subdue her and set her in statis one more time... I
> dont like that idea, but is for her own safely and ours"a d he added "Tell
> when you are ready"
>
> <NEW>
>
> Rodimus, who had not taken his optics off of Nightlight since he had 
> entered
> the room just nodded to Perceptor. He sat down next to Nightlight, placing
> his hands on one of hers, taking it into his own.
>
> His face was both sad and yet concerned. Would she know him or remember 
> him?
> It was as if an eternity had passed since they had really been able to 
> spend
> any time together. The last time he had seen her she really had not
> remembered him, at least not completely. He wondered now if he would be 
> any
> help at all. But he knew that no matter what, he would be here for her.
>
> > <OLD>
> >
> > Quickstride heads to Rodimus but is careful not to be too noisy.
> >
> > "Sir, Straight Shot and I are working in Tucson's lab now, and before we
> can start, we need to get a geographical layout of the surrounding
> parameter. It appears we need a high peak of some sort to carry the weight
> of the wind mill structure. It would hide the device from harm, and
> basically keep the environment the same without harming it. I'm going to
> send some mini probes out there to photograph the area. Once I get those
> back, I'll be able to draw up something."
> >
>
> (OOC: Please keep in mind that Tuscon's old lab and Wheeljack's room will 
> be
> sized for full sized TF's. Tuscon and the rest have all been resized /
> reformatted for BW's sized characters. They will be much too small for 
> most
> of the tools to be used easily.)
>
> <NEW>
>
> Rodimus nodded to Straight Shot but continued to look at Nightlight. "Do
> what you can." He said to her. "Check with Legacy if you need any
> assistance."
>
> A call came in over his radio from Night Shift, and he sent back a quick
> response. He glanced over at Ramulus, "Nightshift and Rat Trap are looking
> for Cheetor. See who is available to give them a hand."
>
> Ramulus nodded as he turned to leave the room. He glanced at Straight shot 
> .
> . .
>
> Rodimus on the other hand looked at Perceptor and nodded, "I am ready. He
> turned to face his wife again, all thoughts of the missions and the Ark as
> he was concerned for her.
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
